A store represents a company or a unique: A store represents a company or a unique catalog of products. If your OMS is connected to multiple eCommerce stores selling different collections of products, you may have multiple Product Stores set up in HotWax Commerce.

If a file includes multiple facilities,: If a file includes multiple facilities, a count is created for every facility. All items with no facility location will be added to the same count.

Removing this session item will delete t: Removing this session item will delete this entry and new proposed variances will be calculated. This action cannot be undone.

Hand-counted items description: Hand-counted items are SKUs you count before the official cycle count window starts—usually because they’re slow movers, hard-to-reach, or you want to reduce floor disruption.
Hand-counted items stability note: They’re physically counted in advance, then held stable (no picks/puts/relocations) or tightly controlled until the cycle count is posted.
Hand-counted items movement note: Any movement after the hand-count has to be tracked/adjusted, otherwise the hand-count becomes unreliable.
Hand-counted items benefit note: The benefit is speed: you shrink the live count scope and finish the cycle count faster with fewer operational pauses.
Begin typing hand-counted product prompt: Begin typing the name of the product you hand-counted in the search box above.
Press enter to add helper: Press Enter to quickly add the top result to your list.
Quick steps to put Socket Mobile S7xx sc: Quick steps to put Socket Mobile S7xx scanners in iOS Basic Keyboard (HID) mode and pair to your iPad.
Select all the required fields to contin: Select all the required fields to continue
Select security groups that can access t: Select security groups that can access the inventory count app store view and create counts in sessions. This does not allow them to impact inventory.
Select security groups that can approve: Select security groups that can approve sessions and then submit proposed count variances for review. This will now allow them to apply variances to their inventory.
Select security groups that can forceful: Select security groups that can forcefully release sessions that are not their own. The force released device will be booted from their session within 30 seconds.
Select security groups that can preview: Select security groups that can preview products in a directed count before the start time.
Select security groups that can start a: Select security groups that can start a cycle count at a store before the designated start time.
Select the following columns from the up: Select the following columns from the uploaded CSV
Session already active for this device: Session already active for this device

Show the current physical quantity expec: Show the current physical quantity expected at locations while counting to help gauge inventory accuracy.

Specify which facility you want to opera: Specify which facility you want to operate from. Order, inventory and other configuration data will be specific to the facility you select.

The timezone you select is used to ensur: The timezone you select is used to ensure automations you schedule are always accurate to the time you select.
This is the name of the OMS you are conn: This is the name of the OMS you are connected to right now. Make sure that you are connected to the right instance before proceeding.
This session will be discarded and it wo: This session will be discarded and it won't be included for review when analyzing variances.
This will set the counted quantity to 0: This will set the counted quantity to 0 for all selected items. Do you want to continue?
Undirected items are products you counte: Undirected items are products you counted but were not instructed to count in this session. Don't worry about them during counting - you'll have a chance to discard them when reviewing and completing this count.
Unsaved counted items will be added to t: Unsaved counted items will be added to the scan events log before leaving this page.
If these items were not intended to be c: If these items were not intended to be counted in this session, you can discard them on the review and complete page.
Undirected items are products you counte: Undirected items are products you counted even though they weren't requested in this directed count. Review this section to decide whether to keep them before completing the count.
If these items were not intended to be c: If these items were not intended to be counted in this session, discard them here before sending the count for head office approval.
Unmatched items are products you counted: Unmatched items are products you counted but were not found in your product catalog. Please match them before submitting for review and completing this count.
Unmatched products should be resolved be: Unmatched products should be resolved before submission
Use the checkboxes to choose which items: Use the checkboxes to choose which items to mark as out of stock.

You have the required permission to subm: You have the required permission to submit counts for review.
You’re about to complete this session in: You’re about to complete this session in the cycle count and won’t be able to edit it again. After all sessions are completed, submit the cycle count for approval from the review cycle count page.
